    • ## Multivariable Vector Function $$ \begin{align*} \mathbf{y} & =\mathbf F(\mathbf{x}),\space f:\mathbb{R}^{m}\rightarrow\mathbb{R}^{n}\\ \mathbf{F}(\mathbf{x}) & =(f_{1}(\mathbf{x}),f_{2}(\mathbf{x}),...,f_{n}(\mathbf{x}))^{T},\mathbf{x}\in\mathbb{R}^{m} \end{align*} $$ * 입력: vector * 출력: vector * 예시 * $\mathbf s(u,v)=(u,v,1+u^2+\frac{v}{1+v^2})^T, 0\leq u,v\leq 1$ $$\begin{aligned} \mathbb R^2 &\rightarrow \mathbb R^3 \\ (u,v) &\rightarrow (x,y,z) \end{aligned} $$ where $x=u, y=1+u^2, z=1+u^2+\frac{v}{1+v^2}$ * graph 표현 :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} ![계산그래프](mvv_fig1.png) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![인공신경망](mvv_fig2.png) ::: ::::
